name: The Curse Of The Black Mirror
name_original: The Curse Of The Black Mirror
description:
Welcome to Fairhaven. Can you discover what is going on in town? 

Developed as a prototype to demonstrate my skillset.

Developed in Unity URP, 3ds Max, Blender, Substance Painter, Reaper.

Concept, modelling, texturing, animation, level design, programming by Ken Davis.

Music by James Tebbitt.

Final year project, BA in Animation, Pulse College, Dublin.
